Description.p: Assigned OID: the SnomedCT OID, qv the link below
A type of specimen taken from a person for subsequent analysis, e.g. a blood sample a breast tissue biopsy, a cervical smear
A code taken from SNOMED CT.
The code shall describe a kind of specimen taken from a person for subsequent analysis
A code from Snomed-CT (UK) may be accompanied by additional qualifying codes from the same coding system.
